title: Complete Project Proposal
description: Draft and submit the project proposal by end of the day.

title: Review Code Changes
description: Review and merge the latest code changes from the development branch.

title: Client Meeting
description: Attend the scheduled client meeting to discuss project updates and feedback.

title: Bug Fixes
description: Address and fix reported bugs in the application.

title: Prepare Monthly Report
description: Compile and prepare the monthly report for team review.
